instruction: Explain the purpose of the Preamble of the US Constitution.
output: The Preamble of the US Constitution provides a succinct description of the purpose of the Constitution. It summarizes the overarching goals of the Constitution, such as establishing justice, promoting the general welfare, and providing for the common defense of the states. It serves to remind citizens of the core values of the US government, emphasizing the importance of protecting the nation’s citizens and promoting the general welfare.
